case.title: Latina seeking romance with white man - 27 (Manhattan)
case.text:
I am 27 years old hispanic dominican female. I am single and looking for a serious long term relationship.I am looking for someone who is honest, respectful, sweet, smart, goodlooking and knows what he wants.Someone who wants a long term relationship and hopefully marriage in the future someone who wants a family and doesnt play games. Ages 32-39 I am college educated and down to earth person.I want someone who doesn't play games and have goals in life.I am 5'3 tall 130 lbs, brown eyes, dark brown hair, light tan skin complextion. .I just want someone whos real and wants a serious relationship
REPLY WITH A PICTURE.... and tell me about you goals aspiration and what your seeking serious inquiries please
